## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT2G41130](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT2G41130)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>bHLH106, STC8</u>
- **Gene Name:** salt tolerant callus 8
- **Description:**   basic helix-loop-helix (bHLH) DNA-binding superfamily protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
